    • catalog

      public void catalog​(int newOld)
      This method offers the user a series of viewing options for all the vehicles in the dealership. The numbers can be used to access specific vehicles through user input.
      pre:
      post: The vehicles will be displayed alongside their position in the ArrayList +1
      Parameters:
      showSold - This value states whether already sold vehicles will be shown.

    • displayVehicle

      public java.lang.String displayVehicle​(int pos)
      This method shows all the information of the vehicle in the given index.
      pre: There must be a vehicle in the index given.
      post: The info on the vehicle will be shown depending on its type.

    • addVehicle

      public void addVehicle​(Vehicle vehicle)

    • registerInterest

      public void registerInterest()
      This method lets the user add a vehicle interest for an specified client. Sold vehicles can't be registered as interests.
      pre: There must be at least one salesman, client and vehicle.
      post: The interest will be added to the selected client if possible.

    • sellVehicle

      public void sellVehicle()
      This method allows the user to sell a vehicle. This will add the vehicle to the client's ownedVehicle, increase the number of sales of the salesman and company by one and add the vehicle's sale price to the company's total sold value.
      pre: There must be at least one salesman, client and vehicle.
      post:

    • addSalesman

      public void addSalesman​(Salesman salesman)
      This method adds the given salesman to the salesmen array. It will print ouy a message if the salesman can't be added.
      pre:
      post: The salesman will be added to the arary if possible
      Parameters:
      salesman - The salesman.

    • registerVehicle

      public void registerVehicle()
      This method allows the user to register a new vehicle. The vehicle will be added to the parking lot if it meets the conditions.
      pre:
      post: The vehicle will be added to the ArrayList vehicles and the parking lot if possible.

    • displayInterest

      public void displayInterest()
      This method allows the user to consult the interests of a client.
      pre:
      post: The interests will be shown.

    • displaySalesmenNames

      public void displaySalesmenNames()
      This method shows the salesmen's names and their numbers.
      pre: post: Info shown.
